item.title: John Mearsheimer: The Inevitable Rivalry
item.description: America, China, and the Tragedy of Great-Power Politics By John J. Mearsheimer November/December 2021 It was a momentous choice. Three decades ago, the Cold War ended, and the United States had won. It was now the sole …
